think_procedure.step_2: Research the documentation or source code of PostgreSQL to understand the behavior and possible values of 'hash_mem_multiplier'.
think_procedure.step_3: Determine if 'hash_mem_multiplier' has any special values that alter its typical function when set to these values.
think_procedure.step_4: If a special value is found, classify 'hash_mem_multiplier' as a 'special knob' and note the special value.
think_procedure.step_5: If no special values are found, classify 'hash_mem_multiplier' as a regular numerical knob.
